scripts.cf:reset: rm -rf .claude .claude-flow .hive-mind .swarm coordination docs calude-flow testing memory research tests && rm -f claude-flow claude-flow.bat claude-flow.config.json claude-flow.ps1
scripts.cf:init: bun run cf:reset && npx claude-flow@alpha init --force
scripts.cf:reset:execute-swarm: bun run cf:init && npx claude-flow@alpha swarm "Read ./TASK_DESCRIPTION.md and implement." --claude
scripts.cf:reset:execute-hive: bun run cf:init && npx claude-flow@alpha hive-mind spawn "Read ./TASK_DESCRIPTION.md and implement." --claude
scripts.cf:execute-hive: npx claude-flow@alpha hive-mind spawn "Read ./TASK_DESCRIPTION.md and implement." --claude
